resources:
SMS Used permissions Access Storage Permission:
Used to read files (images) from sd-card and save pdf-files.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> App info\" and choose \"Permissions\". Landscape Choose file with: // App titles Image to PDF Text to PDF + image + text | … Edit image Crop image Portrait // Snackbar // Toasts OK Cancel PDF successfully created. Images successfully created. Open folder? An error occurred. Open? Please install an app to perform action. Please choose an image. Choose or create a PDF file. Please enter text. Please wait. Saving image. Do not show again No supported file extension Image was edited. Saving? No Entry will be removed. OK? Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. Please choose image file. Please choose PDF file. Grant permission. Open settings? // Main menu Share PDF Open PDF Settings Save Share PDF with: In the attachment you can find the PDF file: Help // Fragments Please enter title: Date Whatever you want ... // Text fragment Delete pages Which pages do you want to keep? Write or paste text Edit existing metadata Create new metadata // Editor Contrast Hue Brightness Sharpness Saturation Exposure Highlight Shadow White Balance Color Balance Levels Min (Mid Adjust) // Dialogs Owner password User password Edit filename Choose filter // Settings About the app App directory Encryption Metadata Image quality Set the image quality. Higher quality results in (much) bigger PDF sizes. Backup Do you want to backup pdf files before manipulating, e.g. deleting or adding pages? Custom directory Format: \"/Download/PDF/\" Let empty to use the default directory (\"/Android/data/de.baumann.pdf/\"). Enter the path to your desired folder on your sdcard. The path must begin and end with \"/\" like \"/Download/PDF/\". If the desired directory does not exist, it will be generated automatically. Author Title Creator Keywords Subject App info Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …). High (100%) Normal (80%) Low (60%) 100 80 60 //Image cropper Saving picture … Rotate left Rotate right //File chooser Cancel Share Rename Delete New filename Sort entries Sort by title Sort by date Sort by extension Search in entries Search in titles Search in creation dates Today Yesterday Day before yesterday This month Own search Cancel search title date extension Files Title // About … and other things Changelog, help, license, used libraries and more. About PDF Creator Developer Used open source libraries Extension Contributors Japanese translation Spanish translation Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). PDF Viewer Is a PDF Viewer based on MuPDF and optimized to work together with PDF Creator. You can download and install the APK file on the Github site (just click). Since there are precompiled libraries included I can not publish PDF Viewer on F-Droid. Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Donate If you like the app, you can donate to me via Paypal (needs internet connection). Used to crop and rotate images. Used to build the intro screen. Used to enhance and manipulate pictures. Used to create and manipulate PDF files. Used to convert PDF files to images. Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons. A powerful image downloading and caching library for Android. Android library to easily pick an image from gallery or camera app. bas
